    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kinetična teorija, temperatura in tlak</string>
            <string language="en">Kinetic Theory, Temperature, and Pressure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinetische Theorie, Temperatur und Druck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théorie, température, et pression cinétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria, temperatura, e pressão cinéticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria, temperatura e pressione cinetiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινητικές θεωρία, θερμοκρασία, και πίεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teoría, temperatura, y presión cinéticas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V posodi se gibljejo različno veliki delci in ustvarjajo tlak v posodi.</string>
            <string language="en">Particles of different sizes are moving in a container and are causing pressure inside it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">temperatura</string>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tlak</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel der unterschiedlichen Größen bewegen 
in einen Behälter und verursachen Druck innerhalb er.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les particules de différentes tailles se 
déplacent dans un récipient et causent la pression à l'intérieur 
d'elle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As partículas de tamanhos diferentes estão 
movendo-se em um recipiente e estão causando-se a pressão dentro 
dela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le particelle dei formati differenti stanno 
muovendosi in un contenitore e stanno causandole la pressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα μόρια των διαφορετικών μεγεθών κινούνται σε ένα 
εμπορευματοκιβώτιο και προκαλούν την πίεση μέσα σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las partículas de diversas tallas se están 
moviendo en un envase y están causando la presión dentro de ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Druck</string>
          </keyword>
